|stockos = Linux;2.6.22;; |exp_if_types = |pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 1 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = |pwr_barrel_inner = |pwr_barrel_len = |pwr_pol = |serial = yes,, 4-pin header,, populated,, 3.3V TTL,, (57600 8N1),, JP12 |jtag = |specialfeat = |flags = |addchip = |802dot11_protocols = bgn |defaulip = 192.168.2.1 |defaultlogin = |defaultpass = |defaultssid = belkin.XXX |defaultssid_regex = ^belkin.[a-f0-9]{3}$ |default_ch = |manuf = Arcadyan |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 04/27/2011 |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = 722868817841 |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = B004N625A0 |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = China |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = |wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = soldered |rad1txchains = 3 |rad1rxchains = 3 |rad1sstreams = 3 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 450 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== A triangular RoHS logo / indicator and "P/N: 141710520000J R01A" is silkscreened on the board. 2.4 GHz only, 10/100/1000 Ethernet The default SSID pattern is '''belkin.XXX''' where '''XXX''' is the last three hex :digits of the wireless interface MAC address (lower case letters). :An example SSID is '''belkin.618''' where the WLAN MAC is 08:86:3B:27:16:18. ==JTAG-Serial Info== ===Serial=== ====Serial Pinouts====
